markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Traveler's Transit](/Spells.aspx?ID=462)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 398 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=30)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You add power to your muscles, allowing you to swim or climb walls with ease. When you cast this spell, you gain either a climb Speed or a swim Speed. The Speed is equal to your land Speed.

---
**Heightened (5th)** You can choose to gain a fly Speed.
name: Traveler's Transit

summary_markdown: You add power to your muscles, allowing you to swim or climb walls with ease.
text: Traveler's Transit Source Core Rulebook pg. 398 4.0 Domain Travel Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Duration 1 minute --- You add power to your muscles, allowing you to swim or climb walls with ease. When you cast this spell, you gain either a climb Speed or a swim Speed. The Speed is equal to your land Speed. --- Heightened (5th) You can choose to gain a fly Speed.
